Airlie Beach Sunset Sail in Style Cruise
Luxe Sunset Sail in Style Cruise
Sail into Sunset Paradise
. Step aboard this purpose-built adventure yacht and unwind on spacious decks as you glide across Airlie Beach Bay, surrounded by the breathtaking Whitsunday Islands and the twinkling coastal lights.
This intimate sailing experience is limited to only
, ensuring a more relaxed and personal atmosphere. Enjoy a complimentary tropical welcome drink on arrival,
then savour freshly prepared
antipasto grazing platters and delicious dessert canapÃ©s
all handcrafted onboard daily.
Departing and returning from
Coral Sea Marina, Northern End, Meeting Point B Airlie Beach,
Queensland.
Cruise Meeting times are as follows:
From $110 pp- " Bring your own drinks" only- no onboard purchases once onboard
Family & group prices available- kids 5+ welcome
Airlie Beach Sunset Sail in Style Cruise (2 Hour)- Need To Knows
What's included on a Airlie Beach Sunset Sail in Style
    Cruise?
2 hours sailing on a SV Wings III
Tropical welcome drink on arrival
Tea varieties & 2 coffee machines
Large spacious decks and top sundeck- perfect for sunset selfies with family &
        friends
3 zoned spotify playing
Cold refrigeration for BYO, ice and cold filtered water- no alcohol sold onboard
Resort casual wear, warmer jacket in the winter months
BYO alcohol, soft drink & juice ( no glass- wine & champagne ok)
Please only bring enough drinks for the 2 hours- a relaxed social environment is our
        vibe
Sunglasses & hat- no heels ladies, barefoot onboard
Camera or go pros for spectacular sunset photos
Jacket or warmer clothes April- September
Your favourite playlist for our premium spotify!
Where do we go?
Step into a world of golden sunsets and serene waters onboard SV Wings III- a luxe 60 ft
      sailing catamaran. Sail and cruise slowly along the Airlie Beach Bay towards Pioneer Rocks
      with the Whitsunday Islands in the background watching as the sun dips into the horizon,
      painting the sky with breathtaking hues in every season.
Feel the gentle sea breeze on your skin as the vibrant coastal town lights begin to
      sparkle, creating a magical evening atmosphere
- a real yacht sailing treat.
Enjoy your own refreshments and we have cold refrigeration for storing onboard, no need to
      bring any esky. The boat is equipped with 3 zoned spotify music onboard & plenty of great
      playlists. There is tea varieties & 2 coffee machines for use.
The Airlie Beach Bay is mostly protected and calm with very little draft. Your skipper is
      very knowledgeable and will sail the vessel at a nice relaxing pace.
There is no option to enter the water on this charter. See our private charter
Premium Sail on the Bay
for
      swimming & jacuzzi use. Options to swim are by private charter only or see our
Whitsunday Islands Sail
      SUP & Snorkel Tour
The Ultimate Whitsunday Charter Boat
Welcome aboard SV Wings III- The ultimate Adventure Family charter vessel perfect for small,
      medium & large groups. Wings III is full
=== TOUR END: Airlie Beach Sunset Sail in Style Cruise ===

Whitsunday Islands Sail, SUP & Snorkel Day Tour
Family / Group
  Bookings
The tour is a 6 hour day, perfect if you are short on time but still looking for an Whitsunday
    Island experience. Bask in the sun on the plush top sundeck, unwind in the shaded seating area
    below, or soak in the foredeck Jacuzzi while taking in the tropical beauty of the Whitsundays
    Islands.
Cruise & Sail towards Langford Island, a mesmerising uninhabited sand cay framed by the
    prestigious Hayman Island. Wings III boasts its own private mooring at the island, providing a
    more exclusive experience. Nearby flexible anchorage options may include the picturesque
    Cockatoo Point, Stonehaven Bay or Bali Hi ensuring a comfortable voyage
Admire & discover the crystal-clear waters and immerse yourself in the wonders of the
    fringing Great Barrier Reef, encountering vibrant marine life and, if you're lucky, a
    gentle green sea turtle. Explore the underwater world through snorkeling, stand-up paddle
    boarding, or try a clear bottom kayak.
Indulge in mouthwatering morning tea sweet and savoury platters. Lunch includes a selection of
    meats and salmon prepared fresh daily by your host using locally sourced Whitsunday
    produce.  Bring your own drinks for the day with cold refrigeration, cups and wine flutes
    onboard. Cold filtered drinking water is available anytime. An Eco friendly charter that helps
    us minimise waste so you do not need to bring any plastic water bottles.
Knowledgeable crew members will guide you through the secrets of the reefs, sharing insights
    about Langford Island and Hook Island. Soak up the sun with family and friends, this tour
    delivers an exceptional experience.
This day tour is tailored for guests aged 10 and above, short on time whilst offering an
    exceptional day of leisure and excitement at your own pace.
Small passenger numbers for a more personal experience with 29 guests maximum.
Cost $230 pp- Kids welcome ages 6+
Group/ family special for 4 or 5 guests travelling
    together!
Meet & greet: 8:50 am  Coral Sea Marina Airlie Beach, Northern End
- Meeting Point B- under the white umbrellas
Returns: Coral Sea Marina  3:30 pm
Check here for available booking
    dates
*Cruise Ships: Please note if you are travelling to the Whitsundays on a cruise ship, the
    timings of this charter
do not always align with visiting cruise ship
    schedules
where the cruise ships dock
at Port of Airlie Marina and how to get to Coral Sea Marina for our daily tour.
Cruise Ship guests- please note if your cruise ship tenders are late
    or do not make it to shore for any reason you forfeit your tour and will need to claim the loss
    on travel insurance.
To avoid disappointment, please check the details of your embark and
    disembark times with your cruise ship thoroughly before booking.
We have 2 suitable private skippered charters that work within cruise ship arrivals for small
      or large private group bookings- not single passenger bookings:
Enjoy your day so much
